attributes.additional_details: As the benefits to elderly people include 100% subsidised transport on public bus transport (and even on some train transport)- wouldn't it be fair for students, who do not receieve any support (such as a pension) to recieve even the slightest of discounts. This means studying and education becomes easier alongisde creating a reason for young people to work and booster the economy. For ages 15/16 to 21 (Late Secondary School Age/College to Late University)
